Class InternshipBrowserView

Object
InternshipBrowserView
public class InternshipBrowserView extends Object
view class responsible for displaying internships and applying user-defined filters provides browsing capabilities for students, company representatives, and staff users rendering and available actions vary based on caller role

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    InternshipBrowserView.Role
    enumeration of supported viewer roles for browser behaviour

    • InternshipBrowserView

      public InternshipBrowserView(InternshipBrowserView.Role role, StudentController studentCtrl, CompanyRepController repCtrl, StaffController staffCtrl)
      construct a browser view with fixed role and controller dependencies
      Parameters:
      role - execution mode defining actions allowed
      studentCtrl - student controller instance
      repCtrl - company representative controller instance
      staffCtrl - staff controller instance
